Ackit!
Acku ad d-temmeslayeḍ seg yal tama.
Acku ar ass-a mazal ur as-fkin ara, ama i netta ama i twacult-is, azal-nsen.
Acku argaz d netta i yettqabalen aεdaw n beṛṛa.
Acku atan da.
Acku atni la ttwalin tiliẓri.
Acku axxam-is ineggi.
Acku aṭas n tewsatin i iruḥen.
Acku bezzaf ɛlay ṭṭalu-nni i d-telsa.
Acku d tamnaḍt n temguri.
Acku d taqcict i telliḍ.
Acku d tizlatin d tceqquft n umezgun i yerẓan kra n yisula n tsertit i yellan deg wahil.
Acku da i yella.
Acku heddreɣ tacinwant.
Acku kemm d taqcict.
Acku la ttetten imensi.
Acku lḥan-d amecwar lwaḥid.
Acku mmi-s n leḥram-nni n urgaz-iw yettwaṭṭef mi d-tlul kan yelli.
Acku nekkni nuklal-it.
Acku s tidet d iɣeblan d tlufa ttidiren iɣef d-iheddeṛ.
Acku ssawaleɣ tacinwat.
Acku ticki nessuter tasuqlit n tefyar seg teglizit ɣer tmaziɣt, d acu ara d-yerr uselkim?
Acku uqbel kulci d imdanen i nella.
Acku walaɣ d akken ur iwulem ara.
Acku ḥemmleɣ ccna seg temẓi-w, ur zmireɣ ara ad as-anfeɣ s sshala.
Acku, ama d inehharen, ama d wid itteddun yid-sen, sεeddayen azal n εecrin armi d asrag n wakud.
Acmummeḥ n wudem-is yemlek akk wid mi fuǧent wallen-nsen fell-as.
Acmux ineɣlen, d acmux iṭenṭunen.

Ad d-yeffeɣ d imsujji yelhan.
Ad d-yeffeɣ deg wayyur-a n yulyu, neɣ deg ɣuct, ma iɛeṭṭel.
Ad d-yeffeɣ deg wussan-a, wungal amaynut n umyaru Ɛmeṛ Ulamaṛa, s uzwel "Agadir n Roma", ɣer teẓrigin Accab.
Ad d-yeffeɣ urgaz-is si lḥebs.
Ad d-yeffeɣ wungal Agadir n Roma n Ɛmeṛ Ulamaṛa.
Ad d-yefk Rebbi lehna a Sliman.

Arrat-nni yeres ɣef tnarit-iw.
Arraw n Aram: Ɛuṣ, Ḥul, Gitir akked Mac.
Arraw n Bariɛa: Ḥibir akked Malkiyil.
Arraw n Cim: Ɛiylam, Acur, Arfaxcad, Lud akked Aram.
Arraw n Dda Lmulud: Mhenni, Muḥend Aɛṛab, Lwennas, Uleḥlu akked nekk.
Arraw n Gumir: Ackanaz, Rifat akked Tugarma.
Arraw n Isasxaṛ: Tulaɛ, Fuwa, Yub akked Cimrun.
Arraw n Isṛayil xedmen akken.
Arraw n Lalla Xelluǧa tameṭṭut n Si Mḥemmed: Yusef akked Binyamin.
Arraw n Lewwi: Gircun, Qahat, Marari.
Arraw n Naftali: Yaḥṣayil, Guni, Yiṣir akked Cilim.
Arraw n Rawubin: Ḥanux, Falu, Ḥiṣrun, Karmi.
Arraw n Raɛma: Caba akked Dadan.
Arraw n Said Uqasi: Yidir, Ǧaɛfaṛ, Smaɛil akked Mexluf.
Arraw n Yahuda: Ɛir, Unan, Cila, Firiṣ akked Ziraḥ.
Arraw n Yuba d imelḥanen.
Arraw n Zabulun: Sirid, Ilun akked Yaḥliyil.
Arraw n takniwin, ur ttemsendahen.
Arraw n tsedda.
Arraw n tsekkurt.
Arraw n Ḥam: Kuc, Miṣrayim, Fut akked Kanɛan.
Arraw-ik ad bedden s idis-ik.
Arraw-ines di geddac yid-sen.
Arraw-inu d nneɛma.
Arraw-inu la sserwaten irden.
Arraw-is werǧin semmḥen di yemma-tsen.
Arraw-is xeddmen akken bɣan.
Arraw-is, trebba-ten ɣef nnif.
Arraw-iw d akniwen.
Arraw-iw d iqbayliyen.
Arraw-iw nneɣnin.
Arraw-iw.
Arraw-nnek ssnen talmanit?
Arraw-nnes d ineglusen.
Arraw-nnes lulen deg Ǧiǧel.
Arraw-nsen ttgen ayen ay bɣan.
Arraw-nsen ttgen ayen ay ɣsen.
Arraw-nsent ttgen ayen ay bɣan.
Arraw-nsent ttgen ayen ay ɣsen.
Arraw-nwen, ur ten-trebbam ara.
Arraz "Meksa Ɛabdelqader" i yicennayen ilmeẓyen.
Arraz Racid Ɛellic yesɛa azal meqqren ama i umaru, neɣ i yimeɣriyen, akked tutlayt n teqbaylit.
Arraz amenzu i terbaɛt n uxxam n yilemẓiyen n Buzgan.
Arraz n Aysat Rabaḥ n tezdeg deg uḥric n useḥbiber ɣef twennaḍt.
Arraz n tseqqamut n uktazal, yewwi-t ugraw Imuhal n uxxam n yilemẓiyen n Umecras.
Arraz n umẓawan yufraren, yewwi-t Ḥamuda Racid n uxxam n yilemẓiyen n Yiferḥunen.
Arraz n wallal n uẓawan, ad rnun ad t-fken i yiwet gar snat n tewsatin-agi i d-nebder.
Arraz n yilemẓi ifazen yuɣal i Kurd Muḥemmed n uxxam n yilemẓiyen n Blida.
Arraz wis kraḍ, yuɣal i terbaɛt n Yiɛeẓẓugen.
Arraz-a, yerra-yi-d asirem deg tiddin n tmetti taqbaylit ɣer tlelli n tikti d wawal.
Arraz-agi, deg tezrigt-is tamezwarut, ad iḥaz aṭas n yiḥricen.

Aru adlis ɣef imal n teqbaylit.

Aru taqbaylit ay aqbayli!

Aselway n Fransa tmanya utlatin iseggasen ma d win n lezzayer tlata utmanyin iseggasen.
Aselway n Unejmuɛ i yidles akked tugdut yessawel-d i tikli di lezzayer tamanaɣt.
Aselway n tegduda ibeddel tamendawt iwakken ad yeḥkem ugar.

Aselway yessebṭel tamsaklit.

Asem.
Asemmiḍ la deg-s yettazu.
Asemmiḍ ur k-id-yeṣṣawaḍ.
Asemmiḍ yebda-d.
Asemmiḍ, agris, lehwa terna tekkat fell-i.
Asemmiḍ, leɛra, cceṛ.
Asemsawi i yellan gar urgaz n tmeṭṭut yefka-t-id ugama.
Asemt-d ad aɣ-teẓremt netturar.
Asemt-d ad aɣ-tɛawnemt.
Asemt-d ad iyi-teẓṛemt.

Asemt-d ad nesgunfu.
Asemt-d ad nezger da.

Asemt-d ar wexxam.
Asemt-d azekka ṣṣbeḥ.
Asemt-d deg lweqt.
Asemt-d yid-i imir-a.
Asemt-d yid-i tura.
Asemt-d zik.
Asemt-d ɣer Tmurt n Leqbayel.
Asemt-d ɣer beṛṛa.
Asemt-d ɣer da akken ma tellamt.
Asemt-d ɣer da deg snat.
Asemt-d ɣer kennemti deg snat.
Asemt-d ɣer tgemmi.
Asemt-d!
Asenduq n cchada, iɛmuden-is akked uɣummu n usuref.
Asenfar i uheggi n yisura n teqbaylit.
Asenfar n tfarawt n tɣiwant, yebdan s uxeddim deg sin yigiman d ṭam, ideg mazal lecɣal urεad kfin.
Asenfar n yinarayen n tɣiwant, i yebdan deg useggas n sin yigiman d mraw d sin.
Asenfar wis sin, d abrid ameqqran ara yeqqnen gar temdint n Tizi Uzzu ɣar ubrid Asammar-Amalu.
Asenfar-nneɣ yeɣli deg waman.
Asenfar-nteɣ yeɣli deg waman.

Atug n rrbeḥ yewweḍ ɣer settin ticcert sebεa u tlatin ɣef mya..

Awit-d učči.

Awit-iyi s axxam.

Awit-iyi-d imsujji.
Awit-iyi-t-id ɣer dagi!

Awit-t-id ɣer da.

Awnul
Awren-a ikcem-it cluc.
Awren-a ikcem-it wakuz.
Awtul ineggez nnig uydi-nni.
Awtul yuɣal d ačaqlal.
Awtul yuɣal d ačeqlal, mi t-yeẓra yizem, yerwel.
Awtul-a yeččuṛ yimi-s d abiba.
Awufan Yuba ad yečč.

Awufan tislit am leḥrir i tsegnit!
Awwah ad tt-niḥwiǧ tagi deg uxeddim.
Awwah! Mači akken!

Awḥid, inɣa-t ccṛaɛ.
Ax a Jim.
Ax a yelli els imeqyasen-a.
Ax awi-yas imekli i baba-k.

Ax!
Ax, ad kem-qadden wiki, yerna ad am-d-grin ad txelṣeḍ imekli.
Ax, iqqaṛ-it, meɛna ittɛuccur.
Ax, iqqaṛ-it, meɛna ittɛuccuṛ.
Ax, ḥulfu-as.
Axaṭaṛ ikad dakken ẓẓay.
Axaṭer Ameɣlal ikkes dderya i tlawin meṛṛa n twacult n Dda Ḥemmu ɣef ddemma n Ṣara, tameṭṭut n Abṛaham.
Axaṭer Ameɣlal iwala-d i lḥif-im.
Axaṭer Ibeṛquqen d iqeddacen-iw.
Axaṭer Illu iburek-iyi aṭas, ur yi-ixuṣṣ wacemma.
Axaṭer Illu yexdem amdan ɣef ṣṣifa-s.
Axaṭer Si Salaḥ ittwaɛzel d imqeddes i Yillu-is.
Axaṭer ad k-rreɣ d ababat n waṭas n yigduden.
Axaṭer ad t-rreɣ d lǧens ameqran.
Axaṭer akka i yi-d-ittunefk lameṛ.
Axaṭer akken i tettḥasabem ara tettuḥasbem.
Axaṭer anda yella ugerruj-ik, dinna i yella wul-ik.
Axaṭer annect-nni n wussan i yelaqen i uɛeṭṭer n lmegget.
Axaṭer aql-ak am Ferɛun.
Axaṭer axeddam yuklal lqut-is.
Axaṭer d aqeddac-ik, i yeḍemnen baba ɣef uqcic-agi.
Axaṭer d aseggas n ṣṣab, ad wen-yili d imqeddes.
Axaṭer d ayen iqedsen nezzeh.
Axaṭer d iqeddacen-iw i d-ssufɣeɣ si tmurt n Maṣer.
Axaṭer d leḥsab n lɣellat i k-d-izzenz.
Axaṭer ddnub n Imuriyen mazal ur iwwiḍ ara ɣer lḥedd-is.
Axaṭer deg unagraw n tutlayin, tufa-d iman-is teṭṭef tama n wadda.
Axaṭer di setta n wussan, Ameɣlal ixleq-d igenwan, lqaɛa, lebḥuṛ akked wayen meṛṛa i ten-iɛemṛen.
Axaṭer dinna i s-d-iḍher Yillu, mi akken yerwel ɣef gma-s.
Axaṭer inna-d: Nekk, d Mmi-s n Yillu.
Axaṭer iɣli-d laẓ di tmurt n Kanɛan.
Axaṭer lliɣ lluẓeɣ, tefkam-iyi ččiɣ.
Axaṭer lliɣ lluẓeɣ, ur yi-tefkim ara ad ččeɣ.
Axaṭer lɣaci ḥesben-t d nnbi.
Axaṭer mi ara ṛuḥent ad swent, ulli-nni sseḍfarent.
Axaṭer nedmeɣ imi i ten-id-xedmeɣ.
Axaṭer nnuɣen yid-s.
Axaṭer s ided n lmefṣel n taɣma i yettwet Si Mḥemmed.
Axaṭer seg urrif-nni i rfan, nɣan irgazen;
Axaṭer tettwadehnem s zzit timqeddest n Umeɣlal.
Axaṭer tikli n yemdanen meṛṛa tefsed di ddunit.
Axaṭer tudert n mkul lxelq deg idammen i tella.
Axaṭer tudert n mkul lxelq, d idammen-nni yellan deg-s.
Axaṭer tugwad dɣa inna-yas: Nniɣ-am teḍṣiḍ!
Axaṭer ul n ugdud-agi yeqqur!
Axaṭer ur tt-fkiɣ ara i mmi Cila, ad izweǧ yid-s.
Axaṭer ur tt-iɛqil ara belli d tislit-is.
Axaṭer walaɣ ayen akk i k-ixdem Laban.
Axaṭer wid yebɣan ad ddmen leɛmeṛ n uqcic, mmuten.
Axaṭer win yebɣan ad isellek taṛwiḥt-is ad tt-isṛuḥ.
Axaṭer zewǧen akk yid-s.
Axaṭer ɣef ddemma n wayen akken i xedmen i ten-keṛheɣ.
Axaṭer ɣef ddemma n yemdanen, ddunit teččuṛ d lbaṭel.
Axaṭer, kečč d aɣebbaṛ, ad tuɣaleḍ alamma d aɣebbaṛ.
Axaṭer, kra n win yessuturen ittaṭṭaf-d.
Axaṭer, s Isḥaq ara tesɛuḍ tarwa ara irefden isem-ik.
Axaṭer, ɣur-i, d kečč i walaɣ d aḥeqqi di lǧil-agi.
Axaṭeṛ atan da.
Axaṭeṛ da i yella.

Axi buh!

Axiṛ-ak ad tgezmeḍ acebbub-ik.

Axiṛ-am ad tgezmeḍ acebbub-im.
Axiṛ-am ad tgezmeḍ acekkuḥ-im.
Axjiḍ aberkan d taɣawsa deg umeɣrad s tufayt d tameqqrant maḍi deg yiwen n ubleɣ d amecṭuḥ aṭas.
Axjiḍ aberkan i d-yezgan di tlemmast n umazellaw-nneɣ.
Axnunnes, d ayen i yessettwaɣayen tamnaḍt-nneɣ akked tdawsa-nneɣ.
Axnunnes, yezmer ad yili deg uzwu, deg waman, deg lqaεa, deg yimeẓẓuɣen, deg wallen.
Axtan-nni i ɣ-xetnen akken, d ajerrem i ttjerrimen deg-neɣ.
Axxam
Axxam ajdid issewḥac.
Axxam akk atan inu i yiman-inu.
Axxam akk gnen.
Axxam ara tkecmeḍ, am yiṭij n ṣṣbeḥ.
Axxam bla tameṭṭut am lebḥer bla lḥut.

Axxi-buh, ččar kemm!
Axṣim ad s-d-tizdig teswiεt.

Ay Afarisi aderɣal!
Ay Ameɣlal!
Ay Ameɣlal, anwa yellan am kečč gar iṛebbiten?
Ay Anẓar, ay Anẓar
Ay Aqbayli yettaǧǧan gma-s yeɣli.
Ay At yiɣil n At Ɛissi.
Ay abeckiḍ bu snesla, mi ara iɛelleq di tesga.
Ay abehlul!
Ay aberwaq, lḥal iḍaq.
Ay abeḥri i d-isuḍen
Ay abeḥri n tɣaltin
Ay abrid i d aɣ-icfan.
Ay abrid ttun medden.
Ay abuhal!
Ay abuneqqar: kečč ur d-qqar, nekkni ur d-neqqar!
Ay acek-itt!
Ay administratif teǧǧel telkett yenaya-s ukured akem aɣeɣ.
Ay adrar err-d awal!
Ay adrar gar idurar, a wi yeccfan ɣef sser.
Ay adrar n at Yiraten, a win ɛlayen ɣlayen.
Ay adɣaɣ ad ak-ḥkuɣ.
Ay afenǧal n lqahwa, a win i d-yettaldayen allen.
Ay afrux ɣef ṭṭaq bedd-as.
Ay afus yecban tiwzet.
Ay afṛux εjel εelli.
Ay agellid ay aḥnin.
Ay aggur lemmer ad tt-teẓṛeḍ.
Ay agu i d-yewwi waḍu.
Ay ahdum yeḍran!
Ay ahṛuḥu, ay d-ittṣaren ass-a.
Ay ajebbar a lewli.
Ay ajeǧǧig n uzaɣar.
Ay akal n lejdud-iw, win i d-ifkan irgazen.
Ay akken i ktaleɣ ur telhi.
Ay akken i tecbeḥ tjeǧǧigt-a!
Ay akken nebɣu nɣenni, nessefruy nettmenni, zik d zik, tura d tura.
Ay akufi ur nesɛi tadimt!
Ay aman senset times, times tugi ad tečč aɛekkaz, aɛekkaz yugi ad iwwet Tehriruc.
Ay amaɣbun-iw ah.
Ay amcum deg-neɣ yeffɣen.
Ay amehtuf!
Ay amesbaṭli iṛuḥen.
Ay ameɣbun-iw ah.
Ay ameɣcuc, i k-isbezgen ad ɣ-iṛuc.
Ay amjahed serǧ i uɛudiw, timlilit s Aqbu.
Ay ammer ad ḥluɣ.
Ay amsebrid s at Yanni.
Ay amuḍin ma ad teččeḍ.
Ay anda tebɣuḍ tawḍeḍ.
Ay aneznaz yekkaten, nekk yufa-yi-d di berra.
Ay aqcic wilan-k?
Ay aqermud n tala, yelli-s n familya.
Ay aqewwad!
Ay aqlalas ssbeɛ bu tissas.
Ay arezg-ik!
Ay argaz, a taɣaṭ!
Ay argaz, ḥemmel tameṭṭut-ik.
Ay arrac n tmurt, ayɣer?
Ay aseksut ur nesɛi tasilt!
Ay asenduq n teslit, awi-d tiwiztin.
Ay asmi ffudeɣ ur swiɣ.
Ay asmi iččiɣ baba!

Ayla-w yugar ayla-nkent.
Ayla-w yugar ayla-nwen.
Aylin d taɣermant takaẓaxit.
Ayt Smaεel.
Ayt Tizi d taɣiwant taqbaylit deg ugezdu n Sṭif.
Ayt Yeḥya Musa.
Ayt taddart akk ssnen imsujji.
Ayt umussu-nwen kkaten, ttrun.
Ayt yiɣrem akk ssnen imsujji.
Aytmaten-inu zewjen deg sin.
Aytmaten-nnes akk d imsujjiyen.
Ayu! Sken-iyi-d, ttxil-k!
Ayu! Sken-iyi-d, ttxil-m!
Ayuu, acḥal tecbeḥ teqcict-a!
Aywa!
Ayweq i iṛuḥ Tom?

Ayweq?
Ayyay
Ayyen akka!?
Ayyur aya seg wasmi ur tt-ẓriɣ.
Ayyur deg yigenni yecher.
Ayyur ittezzi ɣef Wakal.
Ayyur iɛeddan i yezweǧ d Ann.
Ayyur iɛeddan i yuɣ Ann.
Ayyur n Wakal d agensa agaman.
Ayyur tura i iɛeddan.
Ayyur tura i iεeddan.
Ayyur-a, ad gijjeɣ ɣer Tefriqt.
Ayyuz
Ayyuz i kemm!
Ayyuz.

D lqanun ara d-iqqimen i wat Isṛayil, i lebda, si lǧil ɣer lǧil.
D lqanun ara yilin i lebda ɣef ddemma n Umeɣlal.
D lqaɛ usafu.
D lqedd ucacfel.
D lqella n tecriḥt i yeččan bibras.

D lqella n uksum, i yesseknafen turin.

D lqum n tzelli.

Gant-as tikci i Tom.
Gant-d asafag n lkaɣeḍ.
Gant-d umuɣ.
Gant-t s lecraha.
Gant-t.
Gant-tt.
Gar yimelli d ufaṛeẓ.
Gar Sidi-ɛic d Sedduq.
Gar cwiṭ, d waṭas.
Gar sin n yisegra tettawi tettara adida.
Gar tallunt ed wakud.
Gar temsal-agi, aseqdec n uwfus aɣurbiz, d wugur n tsebḍut i d-ttmaggaren yiselmaden.
Gar temsizelt n tmedyazt, timsikniyin, ameslay ɣef tmeddurt d umecawar n lal n tejmilt Anisa.
Gar tizya-s d ddehb d ubriz.
Gar tlawin-a ad naf: Faḍma n Summer.
Gar tunṭiqin n snitra, gar tefyar n tira.
Gar tuɣmas d wugel.
Gar unebdu d nnisan jebbden wussan.
Gar usmekti n uzarug d umennuɣ n umussu.
Gar uɣersiw meṛṛa yesmulḥucen, wigi ḥesbet-ten neǧsen.
Gar warrac akked tullas, di tlata utlatin yid-sen.
Gar wayen i d-ibanen deg wulɣu n tddukkla timsuddest, ad yili umḥizwer n snat tmerwin d kraḍ n yicennayen.
Gar wid i d-yeslulen Tuddsa Timeẓlit n Umussu i Trennawt n Tlelliyin Timagdayin.
Gar wid i d-yeslulen Tuddsa Tuzzigt n Umussu i Trennawt n Tlelliyin Timagdayin.
Gar yemcac, i ubeḥri d ṭlam.
Gar yiccer d uksum.
Gar yicennayen n taddart-agi i d-yecnan ad nebder Marseɣsan.
Gar yigenni ed tmurt.
Gar yisaragen d tmeɣriwin akked waddal.
Gar yisenfaren-agi, tamkerḍit n tɣiwant yebdan deg useggas n sin yigiman d ṣa, ar ass-a urεad tekfi.
Gar yiswiyen n ugraw-a Asaru, d asebɣes d tmerna n ufud i wid ixeddmen ssinima taqbaylit.
Gar yiznan-a.
Gar yizri, d yizri ibaw.
Gar yiḍarren i yettnus wayen i yesɣemlen akk tikta.
Gar zik d tura deg tmurt n leqbayel.
Gar-aneɣ kan, attan tuḍen.
Gar-aneɣ kan, netta d akeddab.
Gar-aneɣ kan, tella tuḍen.
Gar-aneɣ kan, teɛjeb-ik weltma?
Gar-asen Mass Ɛli Lewnis i yeṭṭfen tamnaḍt n Mestɣanem.
Gar-asen gma.
Gar-asen timsikniyin ɣef tudert d yimuhal n bab n tejmilt-agi Ṭaher Useddiq.
Gar-asen, tameɣra n ukermus.
Gar-asen: Asenfar n unnar n semmus tmerwin n yimukan n Buxalfa, swayes i d-yesfaydi ugezdu-nneɣ.
Gar-asent ccna, aẓawan, amezgun, tasekla, isaragen, isura.
Gar-asent tamikanikt, trisiti d tsenselkimt.
Gar-awen ara ttiliɣ dima.

Leqdic igerrzen!
Leqdic ilaq ad yili, ɣas gar yiɛewwiqen. Akken tizlit taqbaylit ad tezbu, ad tesɛu imal yelhan.

Leqdic yella-d s ddeqs n temsikniyin, yerzan tudert d umecwar n ucennay aqbayli.
Leqdic-a, icudd ɣer ddeqs n tussniwin gar-asent: Tasnilest, asefser awurman n tultayt, tusnakt, tigzi tamacinant.
Leqdic-a, sɛeddan-t-id deg tiliẓri tameqqrant i iɛellqen deg wammas n tzeqqa.
Leqdic-agi, d atiknikan yebna ɣef tiktiwin tineggura deg tetiknulujiyin timaynutin.

Maca Malika Dumran terẓa asalu.
Maca ad d-tarud, naɣ?
Maca ad d-tefɣen ilmend n tmurt i tetten arraw-is, umi semman war isem-is.
Maca ad kecmen s agezdu yernu ad xedmen ccɣel-nsen, mbeɛd mi niqal ugin-asen anekcum s agezdu d uxeddim.

Maca argaz ur yezmir ara ad yerkeḍ awal n yemma-s akked baba-s.
Maca ass-a ẓriɣ tidet.
Maca asteqsi: Ayen ḍarrunt cwalat, taggara-agi, deg tesdawit n Mulud Mɛemmri?
Maca asuɣu yugten d wi: Tuddsiwin senzent inelmaden akked Tuddsiwin senzent tasdawit.

Maca aya ur ittett yid-i.

Maṣer tella zik n Yiferɛunen, tura tuɣal i Waɛraben.
Maṣer ttinin-as Miṣr s taɛṛabt.
Mbaddalent iɣeḍmen yid-s.
Mbawel sya.
Mbawlet sya.
Mbeɛb, irna-d gma-s, afus-is iṭṭef deg ugerz n Meẓyan.
Mbeɛd ad d-ffɣen syenna s ssɛaya tameqrant.
Mbeɛd aneḥbus ɣef leqraya i wazal n ddurt.
Mbeɛd as-d, tebɛ-iyi.
Mbeɛd awal n tazwara n unemhal n uɣerbaz-a amenzu.
Mbeɛd ayagi, ad ffɣeɣ.
Mbeɛd aḥemmal-nni ameqran, sɛan-d arrac.
Mbeɛd bessi ad ṣaffiɣ innayen.
Mbeɛd indem, dɣa iṛuḥ.
Mbeɛd iṛuḥ izdeɣ di Girar.
Mbeɛd iṛuḥ si tmurt.
Mbeɛd leqdic d unadi d leɛtab n wacḥal d aseggas.
Mbeɛd mi cnan ihellilen ulin s iɣil n Uzemmur.
Mbeɛd mi d-yella wass n usileɣ amezwaru ass n larebɛa εecrin deg meɣres.
Mbeɛd mi i d-tuɣal temsizzelt n tira "Imura n tmurt-iw" deg teẓrigt-is tis snat.
Mbeɛd mi iɣab azal n sin n yiseggasen ɣef unnar n ccna, ha-t-an yuɣal-d Karim Xelfawi.
Mbeɛd mi mḥezwarent snat n tuddar-a Saḥel di Buzgan akked Lqelɛa n At Ɛebbas deg Yiɣil Ɛli di Bgayet.
Mbeɛd mi t-ṣellben, ferqen llebsa-s s tesɣart.
Mbeɛd mi teɛedda twaɣit-agi, teḍra-d tayeḍ i tt-yecban.
Mbeɛd mi yekker uxxam ad yelḥu deg ugezdu n tutlayt d yidles n tmaziɣt n tesdawit n Mulud Mɛemmeri.
Mbeɛd neffu ɣer Babil, Yaxunya yesɛa-d Caltiyil.
Mbeɛd sebɛa n wussan n tikli, ilḥeq-it s adrar n Gilɛad.
Mbeɛd talalit n Dda Crif, Ramḍan iɛac mitin n iseggasen.
Mbeɛd talalit n Mahalalil, Qiynan iɛac tmen meyya u ṛebɛin n iseggasen, yerna yesɛa-d arrac akked tullas.
Mbeɛd talalit n Nuḥ, Limix iɛac xems meyya u xemsa u ttsɛin n iseggasen, yerna yesɛa-d arrac akked tullas.
Mbeɛd talalit n Qiynan, Anuc iɛac tmen meyya u xemseṭṭac n iseggasen, yerna yesɛa-d arrac akked tullas.
Mbeɛd talalit n Sarug, Raɛu iɛac mitin u sebɛa n iseggasen.
Mbeɛd talalit n Yirid, Mahalalil iɛac tmen meyya utlatin n iseggwasen, yerna yesɛa-d arrac akked tullas.
Mbeɛd tirza ɣer uẓekka n Meksa, deffir-s kan ad ilint ddeqs n tnagiyin, ɣef tudert n ucennay-agi ilemẓi.
Mbeɛd tulya tunṣibt n tfaska-a, ad tebdu temsizzelt s timmad-is, gar snat tmerwin d kraḍ n yilmeẓyen.
Mbeɛd yuɣal-d ikemmel lhedṛa yid-sen.
Mbeɛd, Isḥaq iserreḥ-asen, uɣalen di lehna.
Mbeɛd, iceggeɛ-asen mmi-s.
Mbeɛd, iderman n Kanɛan mfaṛaqen.
Mbeɛd, imudd asfel-nni n ugdud.
Mbeɛd, tesɛa-d taqcict, tsemma-yas Dina.
Mbeɛd, tizlit-nni “Tulawin” n Crif Ḥamani, i d-ɣennant tullas n terbaɛt n ccna n Tdukkkla Imnar n Tdukli.
Mbeɛd, ttarran ablaḍ-nni s amkan-is, ɣef yimi n lbir.
Mbeɛd, uɣal ad tefkeḍ lweɛda-k.
Mbeεd mi i d-yessufeɣ snat n tesfifin iiwumi yefka izwal: “Anda ara kem-afeɣ” d « Mi d-mmektaɣ”.
Mbiwel acemma.
Mbiwel s ttawil.
Mbiwel sya!
Mbiwlemt sya!
Mbiwlet sya!
Mcawaren.
Mcawarent.
Mcettamen s yiɣsan n at laxert.
Mcettament seg yiḍaṛṛen armi d aqeṛṛu.
Mceččaweɣ.
Mceččen izerman.
Mceḥ.

Mdel adlis-ik.
Mdel adlis-im.

Mdel allen-ik.
Mdel allen-im ad txemmmeḍ mliḥ.
Mdel allen-im.
Mdel ddeɛwessu n tewwurt-nni!
Mdel ddeɛwessu-nni n tewwurt!
Mdel idlisen-ik!
Mdel idlisen-im!
Mdel imi-nnem a Layla.
Mdel imi-nnem afuḥan.
Mdel tawwurt s leɛqel.
Mdel tawwurt, ma ulac aɣilif!
Mdel tawwurt, ma ulac aɣilif.
Mdel tawwurt-a s leɛqel.
Mdel tawwurt-inna!
Mdel tawwurt-inna.
Mdel tawwurt-nnek.
Mdel tawwurt-nnem.
Mdel tawwurt-nni n ddeɛwessu!
Mdel tazewwut a Jim.
Mdel tazewwut ma ulac aɣilif.
Mdel tazewwut uqbel ma teddid.
Mdel tazewwut, ma ulac aɣilif.
Mdel tizewwa, ma ulac aɣilif.
Mdel-it.
Mdel-itt.
Mdel-nnem!
Mdexwacen am yilfan.
Mdin-as.
Mebla Rebbi ar d-negri di craɛ.
Mebla Rebbi ma teḍra-s teqsiṭ-a
Mebla ccek!
Mebla ccek, d isem n ukerray amezwaru i yeǧǧa ɣef tewwurt.
Mebla ccekk, d agzar i yettwagzer.
Mebla lemzeyya.
Mebla ma nettu imedyazen d wid iḥemmlen awalen iweznen, i d-yusan ula seg beṛṛa n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu.
Mebla ma nettu-k a Mass.
Mebla ma tkerseḍ anyir
Mebruk i wid i d-yewwin lbak.
Mebruk.
Mebɛid ay d-nwala, lḥara tbedd ɣef tizi.
Mebṛuk!
Mechuṛ ugar n wanect ay iɣil.
Mechuṛ.
Mechuṛ?
Mechuṛet ugar n wanect ay tɣil.
Mechuṛeɣ.
Mecɣulem tura akka?
Mecɣulemt tura akka?
Mecɣuleḍ tura akka?
Mecḍeɣ acebbub-iw.
Mecḍeɣ acekkuḥ-iw.
Mecḥen-d aɣebbar.
Mecḥent-d aɣebbar.
Mecṭuḥ aṭas.
Mecṭuḥ-it yiḍaren-ines.
Mecṭuḥit yiffan-im.
Mecṭuḥit, xeddmen am umeqqran.
Medden akk ad kecmen s ixxamen-nsen.
Medden akk ad mmten.
Medden akk ad xedmen aya.
Medden akk atni deg teftist.
Medden akk ceɣlen, ala nekk.
Medden akk d iɛeryanen din.
Medden akk gren-as tamawt.

Mured.
Musa akked Haṛun kecmen s aqiḍun n temlilit.
Musa akked Haṛun xedmen akken i d-yessendeh Umeɣlal.
Musa akked Haṛun xedmen akken i sen-d-yumeṛ Umeɣlal.
Musa akked Ilya ḍehren-asen-d.
Musa iburek-iten.
Musa ihdeṛ i wat Uɣrib.
Musa iheddeṛ, Illu yettarra-as-d si tlemmast n ṛṛɛud.
Musa iɛawed i Umeɣlal ayen akken i s-d-inna ugdud.
Musa iɛeggeḍ ɣer Umeɣlal, inna-as: D acu ara xedmeɣ i ugdud-agi?
Musa iɣawel ikna ɣer lqaɛa, iseǧǧed.
Musa iɣumm udem-is, axaṭer yugad ad imuqel ɣer Yillu.
Musa iḍegger asɣar-nni s aman, imiren aman-nni uɣalen ḥlawit.
Musa iṛucc s idammen-nni, idisan meṛṛa n uɛalṭar.
Musa iṛuḥ, iɛawed i Umeɣlal ayen akken i s-d-inna ugdud.
Musa iṣubb s agdud, ihdeṛ-asen.
Musa tekcem-it tugdi, inna: Slan akk medden s temsalt-agi!
Musa yeddem tameṭṭut-is d warraw-is, isserkeb-iten ɣef yiɣyal, dɣa ṛuḥen ɣer tmurt n At Jennad.
Musa yeffeɣ-d sɣur Ferɛun, iɛenna ɣer Umeɣlal.
Musa yekker netta d Yacuɛa, amɛiwen-is, yuli s adrar n Yillu.
Musa yekker-d isellek-itent seg-sen, dɣa yessew taqeḍɛit-nsent.
Musa yenna i Ferɛun: Ḥaca-k, ay agellid!
Musa yenna i Haṛun: D acu i k-ixdem ugdud-agi armi i t-teǧǧiḍ ixdem ddnub yecban wagi?
Musa yenna i Umeɣlal: A-t-an tenniḍ-iyi-d: Awi agdud-agi!
Musa yenna i Umeɣlal: Di leɛnaya-k, a Sidi!
Musa yenna-asen: D ayen i d-yumeṛ Umeɣlal.
Musa yenna-asen: Ur ttagadet ara!
Musa yenna-asen: ɣur-wat win ara d-iǧǧen seg-s i ṣṣbeḥ.
Musa yenna-yasen: wwtet-tt ihi, ass-agi.
Musa yenna: ad d-zziɣ i inijel akken ad waliɣ d acu-t leɛǧeb-agi!
Musa yeqsed ad izdeɣ s argaz-nni.
Musa yerra afus-is deg iciwi-s, mi t-id-ikkes, yuɣal ufus-is d amellal am udfel si lberṣ.
Musa yerra-as: Mi ara ffɣeɣ seg uxxam-ik, ad ɛenniɣ ɣer Umeɣlal.
Musa yerra-as: Wagi d aɛekkaz.
Musa yerra-asen: Acuɣer akka i tettnadim ccwal?
Musa yesbedd aqiḍun n temlilit, isers tikersiyin, issuli tincirin, isɛedda iɛmuden, isbedd tigejda.
Musa yexdem akken zdat n imeqranen n Isṛayil.
Musa yexdem ayen akk i s-d-yumeṛ Umeɣlal, akken i yexdem.
Musa yezla-t, iṛucc s idammen-is aɛalṭar meṛṛa.
Musa yuli s adrar, dɣa tagut tɣumm adrar.
Musa yura ayen akk i s-d-inna Umeɣlal.
Musa yuɣ awal i uḍeggal-is, ixdem ayen akk i s-d-inna.
Musa yuɣal ɣer tmurt.
Musa, iqbel ayen akken i s-d-inna Haṛun.

Muḥemmed Buḍyaf d aselway n lezzayer yettwanɣan srid ɣef tilivizyu tazzayrit.
Muḥemmed Buḍyaf nɣant di Ɛennaba.
Muḥemmed Uharu d yiwen deg-sen, ɣas ulac-it, maca s wayen i d-yeǧǧa d leqdic d yigerrujen yella.
Muḥemmed Uharun d yimdukal-is, d wid ur nerri ara aḍar ɣer deffir.
Muḥemmed Uharun, ikemmel deg ubrid n tira, dɣa yura ammud n tmedyazt “Abrid n tlelli”.
Muḥemmed netta yenna d lǧenn i d-yerzan ɣur-s ɣer yifri-nni.

Syin ikemmel amennuɣ deg urebbi n umussu adelsan amaziɣ.
Syin tebda teqqar aẓawan n cceɛbi deg Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmeri n Tizi Uzzu.

Tameddit
Tameddit akk nettat tessewway.
Tameddit igerrzen.

Tameddit yelhan.

Tamenzut, bezzaf ɣlayet.

Tamezwarut, aru-d isem-nnem.

Tamezwarut, ddant ɣer teɣsert.
Tamezwarut, ddiɣ ɣer teɣsert.

Tamezwarut, yedda ɣer teɣsert.

Ticcert mačči i ucebbeḥ kan i temmug deg tira.

Ticki
Ticki ad ak-d-ɣreɣ s usawal.
Ticki ad d-rnuɣ ɣer-wen.
Ticki ad nessiwel ɣef waya.
Ticki ad nessiwel.

Ticki ad tt-nessired.
Ticki ara fakkeɣ, ad ffɣeɣ.
Ticki ttazzaleɣ, seɛɛuɣ tidi.
Ticki, ad yili yemmut.
Ticraḍ s idammen.
Ticraḍ s tmenɣac, mačči s tɣiɣac.
Ticraḍ tigejdanin n yisem.
Ticraḍ tigejdanin.

Ticraḍ tisuddimin.
Tid ara d-ilalen.
Tid ara yeqqerṣen.
Tid i yessnen azeṭṭa akken iwulem.
Tid i yi-skersen wussan.
Tid neɣra deg uɣerbaz, neɣ tid i nferreǧ deg tiliẓri.
Tid yetteɣraṣen.
Tid-nni ur ḥemmleɣ
Tidak ara m-id-smektiɣ.

Tizizwa
Tizizwa ttakfent-aɣ-d tamemt.
Tizizwa ttgent-d tamemt.
Tizizwit tenfeɛ ma d areẓ xaṭi.
Tizizwit txeddem-d tament.
Tizlatin ideg mazal anza-nsent deg yimeẓẓuɣen n medden.
Tizlatin-is srunt-iyi acḥal n tikal.
Tizlit ayyi tettara-yi umreɣ.
Tizlit i d-ccnan yigerdan n tdukkla tadelsant Imnar n Tdukli, yeqqaren dɣa deg uɣerbaz-a.
Tizlit i txedmem kečč d Ben Muḥemmed deg useggas n wagim d tẓa twinas d ṭam tmerwin d sin?
Tizlit n teqbaylit imir-a, ha-tt-an deg waddad ukris.
Tizlit-a d Yuba i tt-yuran.
Tizlit-a isem-is Only You.
Tizlit-a tesseḥzan cwiṭ.
Tizlit-nni d Yuba ay tt-yuran.
Tizlit-nni yura-tt Saɛid Waɛli.
Tizmilin n Yuba gerrzent.
Tizumag n Maṣer bnant s tidi n waklan.
Tiɛuṛba akked tineslemt nɣant tudert n yimaziɣen.
Tiɣaltin yesleɣ wedfel, deg-sent i sɛeddaɣ temẓi-w.
Tiɣawisiwn-a dima ḍerrunt-d.
Tiɣawsiwin ad ɛeddint s tɣawla.
Tiɣawsiwin ffɣent afus.
Tiɣawsiwin seqdacen medden tura.
Tiɣawsiwin ttruẓunt.
Tiɣawsiwin-a d yiwet-nsen akk.
Tiɣawsiwin-a kifkif-iten akk.
Tiɣawsiwin-a ɛedlen akk.
Tiɣendeft d aṭṭan n tmetti.
Tiɣeṭṭen swant aman.
Tiɣilt-nni ur tesɛi isekla.
Tiɣimit urǧin tenɣa yiwen.
Tiɣmiwin akk cebḥent.
Tiɣmiwin-nni mmezgent-d.
Tiɣremt iɣumm-itt wudfel akk.
Tiɣremt meqqert.
Tiɣremt-inna tecbeḥ.
Tiɣri i temsizzelt.
Tiɣri i wid yettarun.
Tiɣri i yilmeẓyen iqbayliyen i iqeddcen.
Tiɣri n yimεellmen n tḥuna d wid yuɣen tannumi qeṭṭun seg ssuq-a.
Tiɣri nesla mi nteṭṭeḍ, tugar kul tayeḍ.
Tiɣri tecceḍ i yiles.
Tiɣri tezwar kul tayeḍ.
Tiɣri-nneɣ d tiɣri n tegmat.
Tiɣrit n tmeṭṭut, d aḍellel i teṭṭellil.
Tiɣriwin i ulmad n teqbaylit.
Tiɣwist n wevyulu tecbeḥ mliḥ.
Tiɣɣersi teɣleb tafawet.
Tiγyulit tuγ lakulat.
Tiḥdayin ad cmumḥent.
Tiḥelwatin-a d tiẓidanin aṭas.
Tiḥerci aked tudert ur xuṣṣent ara.
Tiḥerci deg wallaɣ i tella, tettwaseqdec s wul d yiɣallen.
Tiḥuna bellɛent ass n lḥedd.
Tiḥuna xlant.
Tiṣebḥiyin mi ara d-kkreɣ, ttruḥuɣ ɣer lluzin n ccrab anda i xeddmeɣ.
Tiṭ d taftilt n lǧetta, taftilt n lǧetta d tiṭ.
Tiṭ d wul mxaṣamen, mcaraɛen ɣef zzin.
Tiṭ d wul mxaṣamen.
Tiṭ n Faḍil tella d taberkant.
Tiṭ s tiṭ, tuɣmest s tuɣmest.
Tiṭ tazeṛqaqt tesɛa aẓar n tisselbi.
Tiṭ tenqes, ugel ikkes.
Tiṭ tunag.
Tiṭ twala tayeḍ teggumma.
Tiṭ uyaziḍ s irden.
Tiṭ-ik d awermi.
Tiṭ-ik di tmiḍt-ik.
Tiṭ-is d aɛeqqa n uzemmur yewwan, laɛyun-is d lxiḍ n uzegza yeɣman.
Tiṭṭawin d tizewwa n tneffut.
Tiṭṭawin-nnek la skerkisent.
Tiṭṭawin-nnem la skerkisent.
Tiṭṭawin-nnes d tizegzawin.
Tiṭṭawin-nnes d tiẓerwalin.

Ul teẓwid ɣel likul asennaṭ.

Ul ur t-sɛiɣ akken ad ɛerḍeɣ.
Ul ur t-tesεiḍ.
Ul ur yestufa ma d allaɣ iɣunfa.
Ul ur yettaweḍ d amɣar.
Ul ybani melmi i ylul werjaz.
Ul yerḥa, tazmert ulac.
Ul yeččur, tagnit teḍyeq.
Ul yeččuṛ, iles yeqquṛ.
Ul ymekken ad yɛad tella sys.
Ul-is d ablaḍ.
Ul-is d agris aberkan.
Ul-is d ahaggaṛ.
Ul-is d dheb.
Ul-is d lwiz.
Ul-is idemmek yeččur yebɣa ad ifelleq.
Ul-is irennu deg tyita.
Ul-is ur tt-ibɣi ara.
Ul-is yella yekkat s leɛqel.
Ul-is yesderduf si sdaxel i d-yesṭebṭub.
Ul-is yeččat ɣef wayen akk icebḥen.
Ul-is ḥnin.
Ul-is, yeldi-t akk i medden.
Ul-iw akked ṛṛay-iw mserfan.
Ul-iw am t-id-smireɣ.
Ul-iw d kem i yessaram.
Ul-iw idehhu yes-sem.
Ul-iw iruḥ d isyaxen.
Ul-iw si tayri yeḥfa.
Ul-iw yeddeggir iles-iw.
Ul-iw yedduqus, aṭas i uzzleɣ.
Ul-iw yegguma ad yemɣur, mazal-it yeččur, yesɛa d acu ara d-yini.
Ul-iw yekkat s ddfeq.
Ul-iw yettɣiḍ, yeččewčew imennan
Ul-iw yeččuren d reffu.
Ul-iw yugi ɣas ma bɣiɣ.
Ul-iw zeddigen ad am-yinni.
Ul-iw, taṛwiḥt-iw akk inek.
Ul-nnes d aberkan.
Ul-nneɣ zeddig.
Ul-nni iweznen nenγa-t, yeԑreq ẓelmeḍ d uyeffus.
Ul-nsen yezga yelli, wa ur yesɛi tabaḍnit ɣef wayeḍ.

Wid i d-yufraren deg umḍiq amezwaru, Mass Muḥemmed Arezqi Buɛam, deg wis sin, Mass Ḥusin Ḥeǧǧam.

Ɛli Ideflawen, yella daɣen di ttiɛad mi d-yecna kra n tezlatin, send ad yeǧǧ abrid i wiyaḍ.

Ɣer tagara newwi-ken sanda nebɣa nekni.

Ɣer tagara, Lqeddafi yemmut yir lmut.
Ɣer taggara n temlilit, d tarbaɛt n Weɛfirtewwi i yewwin taqbuct.
Ɣer taggara n temlilit-a, ismekta-d Mass Ɛli Ḥmed Muḥend, ɣef tḥawact n useggas i iɛeddan.
Ɣer taggara ufiɣ txedmeḍ anadi ameqqran ɣef yismawen n yidigan n dinna.
Ɣer taggara, ad d-nesmekti belli tafaska-a, llant deg-s aṭas n tewsatin n tẓuri d yidles.
Ɣer taggara, ad d-nesmekti belli tikli-a, tedda deg talwit d tegnit yelhan, akken armi kfan tameddit n wass.
Ɣer taggara, ad d-nesmekti kan belli seldazekka n larebɛa, ad tili ṭṭhara n yigerdan-agi deg ssbiṭer n Tigzirt.
Ɣer taggara, ad d-nesmekti kan belli, Faṭma Caɛbi tlul deg Lezzayer Tamaneɣ.
Ɣer taggara, ad nesmekti belli Mass Yarkal yewweḍ leɛfu Rebbi ass n umenzu deg yebrir n useggas yezrin.
Ɣer taggara, d awal n yimeḥḍar.
Ɣer taggara, nesteqsa imsuddes n tedwilt Akli.
Ɣer taggara, tella-d tegnit n ccḍeḥ.
Ɣer taggara, tettwasaẓ tuffɣa n walbum-ik amaynut.
Ɣer taggara, yesnemmer aselway n tɣiwant n At Smaεel ɣef wayen i ixeddem seg tama-s i uḥraz n twennaḍt.
Ɣer taggara, yetturaǧu ad yili leqdic anaddal sɣur Ugraw n waddal n taddart.
Ɣer taggara.

ɛinani.
ɛni d nekk i d aɛessas n gma?
ɣef wayagi, ini i wat Isṛayil: Nekk, d Ameɣlal.
Γef waya akk, amdan ara yegren afus deg uslugen n tutlayt d tamasit tameqqrant.
Γef waya ur zmireɣ ara ad aruɣ yis-s, axater ur ssineɣ ara ilugan-is akken iwata.
Γer taggara n tefsut, tekkaw tegnawt, teḥma tmurt.
Γeḍlen-d fell-as buseṭṭaf.

“Iwakken ad iserreḥ wayen yettwarzen."
